author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Original Maine musical in Unity
text:
Original Maine musical in Unity Oct 13, 2015 
Unity — “What is This Life,” an original Maine musical, will be presented Saturday, Oct. 24, at 7:30 p.m. at Unity College Center for the Performing Arts, 42 Depot St. 
The production features Fred Liebfreid, Conor Reeves, Nancy Carbone, Bob Lovelace, Jessica Franzose, Stan Pinnette and Lyric Whitaker. Written by central Maine musician and actor Lovelace, the show premiered in 2007 at the Skowhegan Opera House. It is set in a bar in Maine, where late one night a diverse set of characters emerges to tell surprisingly intertwined stories. 
Tickets are $10, $5 for students and senior citizens, available at the door or online at uccpa.unity.edu . 
Courier Publications’ A&E Editor Dagney C. Ernest can be reached at (207) 594-4401, ext. 115; or dernest@courierpublicationsllc.com.
